summary: Body Fitness Tracking System - a multi-page fitness tracking website with home page, user dashboard (step counter, water intake, calories, BMI summary, weekly charts), BMI calculator, features page, about page, and contact page. Uses HTML/CSS/JavaScript with local storage, Chart.js for visualizations, responsive design, and fitness-themed styling.
architectural_notes: Tech stack: HTML5, CSS3 (Flexbox/Grid), vanilla JavaScript
Local Storage for client-side data persistence
Google Fonts (Poppins or Roboto) for typography
Fitness-themed design: card layout, gradient buttons, soft shadows
imageRequirements:
## Required Images
- Fitness-themed hero background showing a person exercising or gym equipment, vibrant and motivational (hero-fitness.dim_1920x800.png)
- Small step counter icon illustration in a circular design (icon-steps.dim_128x128.png)
- Small water droplet icon illustration in a circular design (icon-water.dim_128x128.png)
- Small flame icon illustration for calories in a circular design (icon-calories.dim_128x128.png)
- Small body measurement icon illustration for BMI in a circular design (icon-bmi.dim_128x128.png)

existing_features.title: Create a Home page with project title 'Body Fitness Tracking System by Rajeshwar Chaudhari', a short introduction about the system's purpose, a hero section with a fitness-themed background image, a 'Get Started' button that navigates to the dashboard, and a navigation bar with links to Home, Dashboard, Features, BMI Calculator, About, and Contact pages
Add a footer to all pages displaying 'BYK College of Commerce', team members section, and the academic year '2025-26'

Create a User Dashboard page that displays a step count tracker with daily steps and progress bar, a water intake tracker showing glasses per day with an add button, calories burned display, BMI result summary, and a weekly progress chart using Chart.js
Add date selection option and reset button to the User Dashboard to allow users to view and reset their daily tracking data

Create a BMI Calculator page with input fields for height in cm and weight in kg, calculate BMI using the formula BMI = weight / (height in meters)Â², and display the BMI value and category (Underweight, Normal, Overweight, Obese) in a styled result card
Implement a Water Intake Tracker that adds 250ml per click, shows a daily goal of 2 liters, and visualizes progress with a progress bar
Create a Step Counter section with a manual step input field, display a daily goal of 10,000 steps, and show progress using an animated circular progress bar
Create a Features page listing the system capabilities: Smart Tracking, Health Analytics, BMI Calculator, Goal Setting, Progress Reports, and Mobile Responsive Design
Create an About page with project description, problem statement, objectives, a list of technologies used (HTML, CSS, JavaScript, Chart.js), and a team members section
Create a Contact page with a form containing name, email, and message input fields, a submit button, and display college contact details for BYK College of Commerce
Implement responsive design ensuring the website works seamlessly on desktop, tablet, and mobile devices using CSS Flexbox and Grid

Apply a fitness-themed design style with card-based layout, gradient buttons, soft shadows, minimalist and professional aesthetic, fitness-themed icons, and use modern fonts like Poppins or Roboto from Google Fonts
Add basic animations and hover effects to interactive elements throughout the website
Implement a dark mode toggle that allows users to switch between light and dark themes across all pages
Create a basic frontend-only login and register system allowing users to create accounts and log in (no backend authentication required)

new_feature_requests.summary: Home page with hero section, navigation, and footer
User dashboard with step tracker, water intake, calories, BMI summary, and weekly progress chart
BMI calculator page with height/weight inputs and category display
Features page listing all system capabilities
About page with project description, objectives, and team members
Contact page with form and college details
Responsive design with animations and hover effects
Implement local storage to persist all user tracking data including steps, water intake, calories, and BMI calculations across browser sessions
